titles.title: A resolution honoring The American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals for the 140 years of service that it has provided to the citizens of the United States and their animals.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/5/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Honors the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals for its 140 years of service to U.S. citizens and their animals.
